title: The First fifty years: Kenya and Tanganyika
creator_credit: Sylvia Story and Mercury Film Productions
brief_description: The development of the grain milling industry in Kenya and Tanganyika. The major part of the film deals with the work of UNGA, a large scale wheat growing and marketing organisation in Kenya, with other sequences giving a general picture of progress in the agricultural industry, underlining the contribution of modern plant, qualified technicians, research and advisory services.
